Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
PostgresUserDAO
public interface UserDAO

Manages the fundamental Database operations for User objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    authUser(String username, String password)
    Authenticates the user via its username and password in the system.

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      int registerUser(String username, String password)

      Registers a User to the system.

      Parameters:
      username - the User's username
      password - the User's password
      Returns:
      the User's ID if successful, -1 if the User already exists in the system.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if username is not a valid username or if either the username or password are too long
      IllegalStateException - if a User with the same username exists already

    • authUser

      int authUser(String username, String password)

      Authenticates the user via its username and password in the system.

      Parameters:
      username - the user's username
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      the user's id if successful, -1 if the password is incorrect and -2 if the user is not registered in the system.

    • getUsers

      Map<String,Integer> getUsers()

      Gets a Map of all the Users'pairs of usernames|userID.

      Returns:
      a Map of all usernames|userIDs.

    • userExists

      int userExists(String username)

      Checks if a User exists.

      Parameters:
      username - the User's username
      Returns:
      if found returns the User's userID, otherwise returns -1

    • getUserMetadata

      User getUserMetadata(int userID)

      Gets a User.

      Parameters:
      userID - the user's ID
      Returns:
      the user, otherwise null.
